Sorry for such a delayed reply. But thanx for your responses. As for the scenery itself, ouch. I don't think there is a FS9 version of this baby. Was really hopeful it would work with FS9. But, then again, no regrets.

Wow another awesome MegaScenery title - thanks!! Need help with fs9's Bird's Eye View Vol 1 -5 - seeders to the rescue?  Vol 1 is 100% but the rest are short - can anyone reseed to help keep these very nice FS9 Flight Simulator textures going?  Thnx for the rescue to those that can help out!

AMAZING! oops, sorry for shouting but . . . the fs community here rocks!  Less than 24 hrs. after a reseed request for Bird's Eye View 1-5 and BAM they are all seeded and now being offered.  For those that think GE Pro is too dark, BEV is an alternative.  One new request - anyone have Just Planes - Air Greenland?  There are now !30! people stuck at 28.4% Whoever reseeds this to full is truly an amazing hero.  Rescue Needed and Thnx 10K times.
